description.value:
You gain training in Intimidate.

In addition, when you use healing word, the target also gains 5 temporary hit points. At 11th level, the temporary hit points increase to 10. At 21st level, they increase to 15.

You also gain the following 1st-level powers: one utility power (inspire dread), two at-will attack powers (fell strike and icon of fear), and one encounter attack power (dread revelation).
